content.body: Please try (force) pushing to that PR branch now. Apparently there was a general problem with the spec generator (not specific to your PR changes) — https://status.w3.org/incidents/89w65fgy69sy — but it’s now been fixed.

content.body: Pinged Denis about it. But by the way, the place I asked about it is the #respec channel in the W3C Slack. So if you want to, you can join there. That said, there’s also a #spec-publication channel — which is usually the right place to get attention about problems with the publications tooling/infrastructure, if it’s not something specific to #respec
